for those who missed it, https://cloudblogs.microsoft.com/opensource/2020/04/07/announcing-krustlet-kubernetes-rust-kubelet-webassembly-wasm/. It's our hope that we can expand on the runtimes used here, and of course reach out to any cluster. v0.2 will have some more of the basic k8s runtime features, like volumes and init modules/containers, but also we will be contributing to getting wasmtime working on arm32 to bring in SoCs and so on. Wamr is on the radar, too. right now the goal is to help experimentation in this space.....

WebAssembly meets Kubernetes with Krustlet - Open Source Blog
Krustlet is a brand new project that helps you test drive WebAssemblies (WASM) in Kubernetes alongside your containers, offering the possibility of new security and runtime capabilities.
